lyrics:
30 contributorso my heart lyricsverse 1 ryan with molly guldemond
oh my heart its a fish out of water
oh my heart its a fish on the rocks
and it bakes in the bad sun
oh my heart its a rock in the gutter
oh my heart its a rock and great boulder
and stuck in the gutter

chorus 1 ryan with molly guldemond and jasmin parkin
and i throw my heart back to the ocean
but it dont go far it come back floating
and i watch it wash it up with the dead fish
but it aint quite dead it just is like this
verse 2 ryan with molly guldemond
oh my heart its a house in tornado
oh my heart its a house in the sky
in the eye of tornado
oh my heart its a roof in el niño
oh my heart its a roof made of straw
in the jaw of el niño

chorus 2 ryan with molly and jasmin
and i pour my heart a new foundation
but it dont set hard it just stays shaking
and i scratch my name i scratch my name in
but it dont set hard it gets mixed back in
see mother mother liveget tickets as low as 27you might also likepostchorus ryan with molly and jasmin
bum bum bum bum bum bum bum bum bum bum
bum bum bum bum bum bum bum bum bum
bum bum bum bum bum bum bum bum buhhh

bridge ryan with molly and jasmin
oh my heart its a fish out of water
oh my heart its a rock in the gutter
oh my heart its the black in a rainbow
oh my heart its so damn so cold
so damn cold

chorus 3 ryan with molly and jasmin
and i throw my heart into the fire
cause i want to set my heart on fire
and i watch it try befriending embers
but the ice dont melt in middecember

outro ryan with molly and jasmin
oh my heart its a fish out of water
oh my heart its a fish on the rocks
and it bakes in the bad sun8embed
